prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent:
---

Promptbook is a project aimed at revolutionizing software development by enabling the creation of AI applications using plain human language, making it understandable and executable by both humans and machines.

prompt.content:
You are experienced content creator, write best title for the document.

# Rules

-   Write just title, nothing else
-   Write maximum 5 words for the title

# The document

> {knowledgePieceContent}

promptResult.content: Promptbook: AI Apps in Human Language
